response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which we believe has the potential to significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and capabilities, we estimate its value to be well above $800,000. Considering this, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $750,000. We understand that the true value of this product may resonate differently with each individual based on their specific needs and goals. Our aim is to ensure that you receive the best possible deal while maximizing the return for us. Please let us know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and requirements. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 750000}
